column5: If you makes you feel better my ex who I dated 3 for years and proposed to was blackmailed by her own family to break up with me and has slept with or dated all but two of what I considered friends whilst growing up and she had the audacity to befriended the other two. It will never be a pleasant experience but it gets easier every day. Remember  seven billion plus humans on this earth, never let just one stop you from being happy in the long run.
